pages.text: As your travels continue you just might find that 36 items just isn't enough ... especially if you spend much time mining.

Satchels can carry up to 9 items and can be configured to automatically stash certain items as you pick them up.$(br2)The satchel can be upgraded several times, gaining an additional capacity of 9 with each upgrade.
This is a unique type of satchel.  Anything placed within disappears ... permanently.$(br2)Use with caution.

pages.title: Dyeing
pages.text: Satchels have an additional feature ... the ability to dye them whatever colour you like.  Two colours, actually.$(br2)All you need to do is place your satchel in a crafting table with a dye both above and below it.

A must have for any practicing druid, the Component Pouch can not only carry the herbs needed for your spells but also anything else you can fit within.$(br2)More information can be found within $(l:books/roots)The Druidic Arts$(/l).

A must have for the budding engineer, the Toolbox has slots dedicated to your tools of the trade, as well as various components, food, and more.$(br2)More information can be found within the $(l:books/ImmersiveEngineering)Engineer's Manual$(/l).
